wikipedia_page.main: Bryan Larkin (born 7 August 1973) is a Scottish actor, writer, producer and self-taught filmmaker. He was awarded the Trailblazer award at the Edinburgh International Film Festival in 2009. He is best known for his role of Dolokhov in Outpost: Rise of the Spetsnaz directed by Kieran Parker.

response: Running in Traffic is a dramatic Scottish feature film. The story follows the lives of two central characters, Joe Cullen, played by Bryan Larkin and Kayla Golebiowski, Anna Kerth, as they try to rebuild their lives after each two unrelated tragedies. The central plot centers on how two strangers lives can impact one another. The film also stars Kenneth Cranham in the role of Bill Cullen; Cullen's uncle. It was first screened at the Edinburgh International Film Festival in 2009. It was directed by Dale Corlett and written by Bryan Larkin.

I Am Vengeance (sometimes called just "Vengeance") is a 2018 British action film written and directed by Ross Boyask and starring Wade Barrett, Anna Shaffer, Bryan Larkin, Kevin Leslie, Gary Daniels and Keith Allen.
